creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Collage with pigments and applied beads; surreal head with face at right and second face at left, on hair bun; large upside down eye at center right; large frowning mouth at right; small ear near center; amphibian or snake eyes on chin of smaller face (on hair bun); small hand in front of leftmost eye on face on hair bun; headless body of seated leopard between back of larger head and hair bun; pink drapery around neck; applied grey and pearl-like beads on forehead of larger face; pink-grey mottled ground; white frame
medium: Paper collage, ink, beads, and spray paint on acetate
title: Pretty Double-Head
